findings.description: Spot-check to ensure that textual evidence quoted in the report exists in the evidence database.
findings.details: The evidence database required to confirm the presence of quoted textual evidence was not provided. Therefore, it was not possible to validate whether the randomly selected quotes exist in an external database.
examples: They are prepared to destroy Social Security...
...we can create the kind of nation that we deserve.
This illegal alien beat this boy to death...
We are witnessing an oligarchy in America... But we’re smarter than that Greeley. We know better than that.
Whatever our differences, we are fellow Americans...
